author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO BRINGING LOCALLY HEAVY RAINS TO PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...IVO BRINGING LOCALLY HEAVY RAINS TO PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Wed Aug 06 the center of Ivo was located near 15.0, -100.9 with movement WNW at 22 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO BRINGING LOCALLY HEAVY RAINS TO PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Wed Aug 06 the center of Ivo was located near 15.0, -100.9 with movement WNW at 22 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
